rows.label: bf03370100_0010
rows.name:
Well, I'll be... It's just one blast from
the past after another today.

rows.label: bf03370100_0020
rows.name:
You probably guessed,
but we're not here for a reunion.

rows.label: bf03370100_0030
rows.name: Just as well. The Holy Grail's gone already.

rows.label: bf03370100_0040
rows.name: You who share the same roots as her.

rows.label: bf03370100_0070
rows.name:
I'll wager all the doctors in this town are
quacks, and all the Blades are blunt.

rows.label: bf03370100_0080
rows.name:
Kamui and I... We could fix that stagnant
ether flow with a minimum of bother.

rows.label: bf03370100_0090
rows.name:
What do you say?
You could still have a lot of good years ahead of you!

rows.label: bf03370100_0100
rows.name: I mean, I won't deny there'd be a certain quid pro quo involved.

rows.label: bf03370100_0110
rows.name: But old man, just think of the benefits!

rows.label: bf03370100_0120
rows.name: Come, can't you lend us your expertise here?

rows.label: bf03370100_0130
rows.name: Do so, and you could live for a long, long time.

rows.label: bf03370100_0140
rows.name:
You know, friend, I'm not as attached to my life as I used to be.
Maybe I've had enough!

rows.label: bf03370100_0150
rows.name: Your little lost souls will be simply inconsolable.

rows.label: bf03370100_0170
rows.name:
This is becoming a farce.
A horrendously clich√©d one at that!
